score: 1 out of 3 people found the following review useful
review: Sadly, even the adult we're supposed to like (William) isn't too likeable, but fortunately the kids are.  Well acted (again, especially by the teens) and affecting, though the family doesn't seem as screwed up as the one in Buffalo '66.  Those looking for a straightforward script that resolves everything logically will be disappointed.
